You don't seem to harbor any negative emotions toward anybody, except yourself, which is a strong sign of dominant Introverted Feeling, which is the leading cognitive function of INFPs. You are also very creative and break the rules with your videos and go off on a tangent frequently, which hints towards a high Extraverted Intuition, which is the auxiliary function of INFPs. If you have no idea what I'm talking about, you can look at your description here: https://www.16personalities.com/infp-personality

Sorry if this was a little creepy, I just love your videos :)

html:
8.26.16  2:25 am   What font do you use in your videos? Helvetica?


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/default-font.html


7.9.17  2:25 pm   I've noticed that throughout your earlier shorts, you've used many different fonts, such as Times New Roman, Courier New, papyrus, and some less easily identifiable ones. For this site, you also use TNR. I'm quite curious as to why you use mostly Helvetica in your newer videos.

     

1.19.17  8:18 pm   what font do you use in your videos?

     

8.26.16  2:25 am   What font do you use in your videos? Helvetica?

     

8.26.16  1:59 am   Hey, Bill, how's it going? Do you use certain fonts like Arial and Times New Roman for a certain reason? Simplicity? Nostalgia? I've always found those fonts to be simple, but powerful, myself. -charles

     

7.3.16  8:10 pm   how come you use the default font?

     

7.3.16  1:17 am   What is the font you use for most of your videos?

     

6.13.16  7:23 pm   what's your favorite font to use in your videos

     

5.7.16  2:13 am   What font do you use.. Helvetica? and why?

     

     i used to worry about different fonts for everything, but that became not only a waste of time, but also distracting from a viewing standpoint. i ultimately made a decision to actually use the default font for everything. it gave me a lot of creative clarity, and greater efficiency. i learned it's better to focus on your strong points, and don't worry about things that are not your strong points. i don't make my own fonts, and i don't have access to a large font libary, so this would not be a strong point. by religiously using the default font only, i found that i could instantly put all my focus on things that are my strong points -- positioning, angles, motion, and timing.
original_html: 8.26.16  2:25 am   What font do you use in your videos? Helvetica?
